title: EXTRA: Inside Story of President Trump's White House
itunes:title: EXTRA: Inside Story of President Trump's White House
description:
In this Sound On Extra podcast, Kevin Cirilli, Chief Washington Correspondent for Bloomberg Television and Bloomberg Radio talks to Jake Sherman and Anna Palmer, senior writers for Politico, coauthors of Politico Playbook, and authors of the new book, "THE HILL TO DIE ON." They discuss the inside story of President Trump’s first two years in office as viewed from both sides of the aisle on Capitol Hill.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
